ygData.subject: Re: cancel magic
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a spell which removes a magical effect on someone.  Works great if you need to removed that nasty Charm that is causing your best friend to beat the
ygData.messageBody:
This is a spell which removes a magical effect on someone. Works great if
you need to removed that nasty Charm that is causing your best friend to
beat the snot out of your party. It will not take away mana from anyone
(well it does cost you mana to cast it).

I removed the Charm from a friend when the Festering Hag cast it on him.
Definitely worth the mana and cost in coins.

- Ziffnab of Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul McClung [mailto:p.e.mcclung@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 8:12 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] cancel magic


From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>

Is cancel magic just a debuffing spell?

If I cast it on an orc oracle for example, will it take away that oracles
mana?


- Paul
